title: Atomic-scale description of 2D Janus MoSO and MoSeO formation: oxidation patterns and band-gap engineering
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29160-29167
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02928C, Paper

Jair Othoniel Dominguez Godinez, Héctor Noé Fernández Escamilla, José de Jesús Quijano Briones, José Israel Paez Ornelas, Eduardo Peréz Tijerina, R. Ponce-Pérez, D. M. Hoat, Jonathan Guerrero Sánchez
MoS2 and MoSe2 possess direct band gaps of 1.62 and 1.45 eV, respectively. Both monolayers are prone to oxidation in oxygen-rich environments. We have studied the oxidation process in these 2D systems using first-principles calculations.
